TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {253062=In 2011 for the first time in their twenty-year history our sister gallery Gallery Pangolin invited a guest curator to collaborate with them, Jerwood Award-winner Lorraine Robbins, who now combines her own fine art practice with teaching Art and Design at Stroud College., 254684=© Kings Place 2011 90 York Way, London, N1 9AG. Box Office on 020 7520 1490., 253349=2011 saw the sixtieth anniversary of the Festival of Britain for which the then relatively unknown sculptor Lynn Chadwick was commissioned to make two major works. It therefore seems fitting that they commissioned six young artists to produce new works in response to and inspired by a Chadwick sculpture of their choice., 254819=For general enquiries or comments, please use the online feedback form, email info@kingsplace.co.uk or call 020 7520 1440.}
